= What is Gamnet =
 * _Gamnet_ 은 C++로 작성된 boost asio 기반 네트워크 프레임워크 입니다.

= Code Example =
{{{
#include <Gamnet.h>
using namespace Gamnet;

class ClientSession : public Network::Session
{
public :
	virtual void OnAccept() {}
	virtual void OnClose(int reason) {}
};

class HandlerEcho : public Gamnet::Network::IHandler 
{
public:
  HandlerEcho() {}
  virtual ~HandlerEcho() {}

  void Recv_Req(std::shared_ptr<ClientSession> client, std::shared_ptr<Network::Packet> packet)
  {
    Msg_CS_Echo_Req req;
    Msg_SC_Echo_Ans ans;
    try {
        if(false == Network::Packet::Load(cs_req, packet))
        {
            throw Exception(1, "packet load fail");
        }
        ans.Message = req.Message;
    }
    catch(const Gamnet::Exception& e)
    {
        Log::Write(GAMNET_ERR, e.what());
    }
    Network::SendMsg(client, sc_ans);
  }
};

GAMNET_BIND_NETWORK_HANDLER(
  ClientSession, Msg_CS_Echo_Req,
  HandlerEcho, Recv_CS_Req, HandlerCreate
);

int main()
{
  Gamnet::Log::ReadXml("config.xml");
  Gamnet::Network::Listen<ClientSession>(20000, 1024, 60);
  Gamnet::Run(10);
  return 0;
}
}}}
= GETTING STARTED =
== Getting source code ==
 * https://code.google.com/p/gamnet/source/checkout

== Install build essential ==
=== in linux(ubuntu) ===
 * Frist, You should install gdebi-core package to install custom build-essential,  'gamnet-linux-build-essential.deb' package includes every things needed for 'gamnet' framework.

  # $ sudo apt-get update
  # $ sudo apt-get install gdebi-core
 * move to 'gamnet' directory and execute 'gdebi' to install build essential
  {{{
$ cd gamnet/linux-build-essential
$ ls
build.sh  control  gamnet-linux-build-essential.deb  postinst  src
$ sudo gdebi gamnet-linux-build-essential.deb
  }}}
